body.translate: тело, корпус, кузов, труп, организация, воплощать, придавать форму
examples: a sound mind in a sound body
a part of the body
Her body is very muscular.
His arms cocooned her body.
She has a lean, athletic body.
The lion has a sinewy body.
His body strengthened.
parts of the human body
The body lay in a pool of blood.
He felt his body go limp.
The dog has a powerful body.
The body of the message was short.
He has a compact body.
the buff body of an athlete
The fever weakened his body.
Parliament is an elected body.
He dumped her body into the sea.
the body's storage of fat
Great sobs racked her body.
a body kept trim by exercise
The bullets riddled his body.
His body contorted with pain.
the lithe body of a dancer
the caudal end of the body
the biform body of a mermaid
His body contorted in agony.
the frailty of her thin body
the body's absorption of iron
the charred remains of a body
The dress clings to her body.
example_translate: Он почувствовал, как его тело обмякло.
Он сбросил её тело в море.
Её тело сотрясалось от сильных рыданий.
тело, которое поддерживается в форме с помощью тренировок
